experiment.name: Do vs dont formulation tweet sentiment analysis

sample.input: @VirginAmerica classiq, luv Virgin America. Greetingz
@VirginAmerica Just trying to book tickets to NYC and facing super fun broken styling. Don't worry, I'll keep trying :)
@united despite my bag not making it to Newark good informative email tracking updates help!
@united maybe one day you'll be the one quoted on http://t.co/mJkpgVXmPC
@united i need it there before she lands so she can have the EWR baggage claim file to have it sent but the employee has not droppeditoffyet
@united Woke up to notification- flight moved 1.5 hrs early. Barely made flight then 3 hrs layover in SFO - wanted to hop on earlier option

@united I would like to talk to a customer service agent about the service / non service I received on my last flight a a week or so a go.
J
@united This is the 2nd time I was rebooked (w/delays), and for reasons unreLate Flightd to weather. How do I go about requesting a flight voucher?
@United maybe find a different gate #ua1758
@united...do you still have flat tire policy.  Shuttle broke down on way to ORD.  Will probably miss the 425pm to CLE...Help please!!
@united - tick, tock, tick, tock, it is rapidly approaching the next dream departure of 1:45pm. When is the next fantasy departure time??
@united this customer service experience will be tweeted for quality assurance.
@united any chance you could help rebook?? My flight Cancelled Flightled
@united What does delayed due to Customer Service mean for UA761?
@united I'm a first time solo female traveller and it's pretty scary being in a foreign place not knowing where your belongings are...
@united flight ua90 is taking off now after 1750 was delayed over 4 hrs 30 passengers to miss their flight to tel aviv
@united what exactly do you hang on this hook? http://t.co/ZHxOk07Aqa
.@united too much info to share via tweet. Please send me your name and contact info. Happy to supply you with images and CS rep names.
@united First Officer of UA 1514 checking our 757 prior to departure from EWR yesterday while on his cell. Safety ??? http://t.co/1TFH2v0a7z
@united no still trying to get home.
@united I may not hit any new status this year, but I‚Äôve flown several times this year and have tried to book with y‚Äôall every time!
@united love being told you would issue a refund when you couldn't get us out of the way of a hurricane to have it denied
@united Thanks! Just DMed HN.
@united all good, didn't die or anything. As they say "you get what you pay for"!
@united looking back - never heard from anyone - I had to call and frankly got standard SOP - still think about it today
@united makes total sense, except flight wasn't full :) I've got empty seats around me & overheads were more than half open when I boarded.
@united #1007 Houston-Bogota boarding again, safety first, it seems the mechanics fixed the problem faster, good energy to fly home/family
@united I will be stunned if my bags are in Hartford with me.  The ORD ground crew only had an hour to move my bags 200 yards
@united still can't dm, it's LH7631 on 21/2/15
@united are my bags here yet?  They were at Palm Springs airport.  I was at LAX.  How come I beat my bags here.
@united thanks for the offer, but I finally made it to my destination, albeit hours Late Flight.
@united the refund request functionality on http://t.co/5IMDckODfx is broken.i get a time out error.
@united + besides, no small degree of self-interest. We take that route several times a year & would hate to be in that situation.
@SouthwestAir wifi stays connected about the lifetime of a higgs boson
@SouthwestAir here is my conf #F8NEQM. My flight was delayed for 3 hours while my friend waited for me on her bday. Please follow up.
@SouthwestAir oh no worries. Just have never seen that before until today. I mean‚Ä¶it is a great card üòÄ
@SouthwestAir really easy for locals to get down to the strip. book.
@SouthwestAir Thanks. I did go through these motions shortly after my flight yesterday. I wonder how quickly flight attendants are notified.
@SouthwestAir i just recieved an email from your memphis station hopefully they have my bag.
@SouthwestAir pleaseeee resume direct flights from FLL to PHL. I don't want to fly with anyone else üò©üò´üò¢
@SouthwestAir I wish i would've seen this 4 hours ago!!! I WANTED TO SEE THEM TONIGHT SO BAD!!!! #CRYING
@SouthwestAir delay is understandable but look at the time of the the flight and boarding time. Weird!
@SouthwestAir the sign in screen had major mobile issues, the responsive design wasn't working properly my Nexus 5.
@SouthwestAir Is my friend lucky enough to see #DestinationDragons live on his birthday? He's been a fan for years @thirty_lives
@SouthwestAir have a flight from Oakland to SNA at 7:30, and I asked if I can take 5:30, even there are 5 empty sests. Answer is "No". :(
@SouthwestAir alas, it was pretty full so we had to entertain ourselves with witty repartee ...
@SouthwestAir Yeah, we figured it out.  Thanks.
@SouthwestAir I'm concerned that you will Cancelled Flight my flight out of BNA tomorrow am. Should I be?
@SouthwestAir done messed up now!!! I have planned a trip to #CostaRica for pennies!!! #VacaTime ‚úàÔ∏èüí∫
@southwestair TREMENDOUS job. Atlanta Airport saw SW celebrate Mardi Gras. Another reason I'm nuts for you guys! http://t.co/8WBzOrRn3C
@SouthwestAir Thank you - hung up after 1hr 7min on hold. Would you like me to DM you contact info?
@SouthwestAir I need updates on my flights 464 & 3574. I have been on hold for over 2 hours.
@JetBlue can't book a flight because of outdated, forced opt-in "Verified by Visa" nonsense. Help a girl out? I just want to get to @sxsw
@JetBlue thank you! Headed from LBC to OAK !
OMGee!!! @JetBlue #OnFleek Why @JetBlue Why?!? üò≠üòÅüòÜüòµ How many people even know what that means, lol?

@JetBlue I digg it!
@JetBlue @BrandsSayingBae well here we go
@JetBlue Understood but I watched as fam heading to FL was expedited when they had 25m to takeoff. I am speaking at conference in SF
@JetBlue wall separating in row 1. #safetyconcerns http://t.co/zTrDwV0N4l
@JetBlue I know, but I wanted to pass it along. Not good for the "T5 experience" esp for someone who flies 2-3 times a month.
@JetBlue I fly w/u as much as I can, however your kiosks were broken in SYR and there was 1 woman working the ticket counter.. She had a

@JetBlue thanks...

@JetBlue nope. None to be found

@JetBlue  I'm game if you're buying!!  ;)

@JetBlue I will try that. Thanks! If all else fails I will just do the old fashioned method tomorrow morning.

@USAirways ok thanks

@USAirways back in line at terminal because phone guy couldn't help.  One person in front of me 20 min wait again? http://t.co/HQHdAD7fvK
@USAirways okay, great. Thank you!

@USAirways ok. Thank you
@USAirways but don't worry! They found a hotel, it's only 45min away. I got there around 11:30pm, no problem.
@USAirways I needed to be at my destination by lunchtime today. No one could get us on a flight, but I've since learned @Delta had one!
@USAirways but it's not their fault, because their policy says they at least got us to our destination. Really?
@USAirways that's where we are now. Thank you.
@USAirways just called reservations.  Cannot change just able to put note on res.  Problem is tsa...

@USAirways I asked for some reimbursement something like miles added to my account and was told to call customer service
Thanks. ‚Äú@USAirways: @fispahani Weather disruptions have caused some of our crew to run Late Flight. We're sorry for the delay to your flight.‚Äù
@USAirways  redeemed themselves!  Flight out at 7:44!!! Had to call and negotiate,  but thank the Lord I'm heading home!!!!!
@USAirways This flight was for my brother. He has been rebooked and I was able to give my info over the phone to get him a pass to the Club.
